items.sentence: Tom said he liked what she had made for dinner, but he was only being polite.
Tom believes that getting married to Mary was the best thing he\'s ever done.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all went to the park to play on the merry-go-round.
Tom has three sisters. One lives in Boston and the other two live in Chicago.
Tom doesn\'t like swimming in pools. He prefers swimming in lakes and rivers.
Tom hid in the mountains because he didn\'t want to get caught by the police.
I wish I could figure out how to finish this project without asking for help.
If there are no dogs in heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
It seems that Tom had planned to give Mary the loan she had been looking for.
Tom\'s partner thought that they should also sell gourmet popcorn seasonings.
Tom was supposed to help me paint the barn yesterday, but he never showed up.
I can\'t tell you what a disappointment it was that Tom didn\'t win the race.
Tom ignored Mary almost all day, but finally talked to her just after dinner.
Tom lied about his age, so Mary thought he was much older than he really was.
Tom plans to go to Boston as soon as he can after his summer vacation begins.
In the early afternoon, Tom decided that he just had to get out of the house.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time trying to convince Tom to study French.
I don\'t see how Tom can stay up all night and then be so wide awake at work.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever told Mary about what we did on that day.
Mary dreamed that one day she would meet a prince and they would get married.
